reviewText: LANG. X RATED FOR ADULTS ONLY, FUNNY AS HELL, THEY ARE A REAL CLUB IN CALIFORNIA, DOING GOOD THINGS FOR THE COMMUNITY
Funny as hell, but there's not enough material in there.  Next dvd, put more material in there make it worth the dollars we spend.
If your Italian, or you atleast have a sense of humor this if for you. Hillarious and entertaining as the first. Also very informative.

This DVD is one of the most unique comedies I have ever seen.  If you fascinated by the Sopranos, Goodfellas or Italian-American culture in general, you will love this comedic window into their world.  You really feel like you are a part of these guys life and "club" as they cater a meal for an upcoming charity event.  You laugh with the guys and are really touched in the end by their big hearts.

This is a perfect gift for that hard to buy for person in your life.  This is such a unique world and it is hilarious!!
